short_summary: Spares for ICTRS RADIO EQUIPMENT (HLX CLASS SHIP)
tags: Defence instant offers get instant quote condition
full_summary:
**Title**
Spares for HLX Class Ship ICTRS Radio Equipment
-----------------------------------------------

**Procurement Details**
* **Reference Number**: CB-916-89214304
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-242436A
* **Publication Date**: February 23, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 3, 2024 14:00:00
* **Tender Status**: Expired

**Notice Type**
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of spare parts for the ICTRS Radio Equipment on HLX Class Ships. The delivery will be split between CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt.

**Description of Items**
The following items are required:

* Item 1: Electrical Plug Connector, 5 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax
	+ Reference Part No.: MS3456W12S-3P, NCAGE 0U583 SAE International
	+ OR Reference Part No.: 810VI0715, NCAGE A0199 Leonardo S.p.a.
* Item 2: Electrical Plug Connector, 3 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
	+ Reference Part No.: MS3456W12S-3P, NCAGE 0U583 SAE International
	+ OR Reference Part No.: 810VI0715, NCAGE A0199 Leonardo S.p.a.
* Item 3: Battery Charger Adapter, 32 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax
	+ Reference Part No.: CNF-0227/01, NCAGE 64415 SELEX ES INC
* Item 4: Battery Charger Adapter, 22 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
	+ Reference Part No.: CNF-0227/01, NCAGE 64415 SELEX ES INC
* Item 5: Data Storage Memory Unit, 6 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax
	+ Reference Part No.: 153712-1, NCAGE 38200 DRS Technologies Canada Ltd
* Item 6: Data Storage Memory Unit, 4 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
	+ Reference Part No.: 153712-1, NCAGE 38200 DRS Technologies Canada Ltd

**Bidders Information**
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name
